scripts.clean: yarn workspace malloy clean && yarn tsc --build --clean
scripts.build: yarn workspace malloy build-parser && yarn tsc --build
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn workspaces run test
scripts.docs-clean: rm -rf docs/.jekyll-cache/ && rm -rf docs/_includes/generated/ && rm -rf docs/documentation
scripts.docs-build: yarn docs-prebuild && ts-node docs/_scripts/build_docs/index.ts && cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.docs-postprocess: yarn wait-on ./docs/_includes/generated/toc.html && cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.docs-serve: yarn docs-prebuild && yarn concurrently --kill-others 'yarn docs-preprocess' 'yarn docs-postprocess'
